name: Jimmy's Fish PLUS [MINIGAMES]
description:
Jimmy's Fish Plus is my game Jimmy's Fish (On My Itch.io Acc, Scratch, Newgrounds) but remastered and better. Completely remade from scratch (pun intended), after one month, I present to you, Jimmy's Fish PLUS!!!!

Controls:

WASD to move

Walk into things to collect them

Achievements save automatically in your game even if you close or restart!

This will be updated Again soon!!!!

Enjoy!

Fanart by ItsYaBoy_Bobby on Scratch.mit.edu

V1.2 is out now!
